name: 李泳霆
objective:
車輛的應用中包含許多的化學反應，例如噴漆和塗料的使用，要了解車用塗料的操作原理、和研發特用的功能，需要具備基礎化學、有機化學、高分子化學和塗料的知識。本課程針對漆的化學概念，介紹車輛中所使用化學品相關的化學理論，進一步連結到學生在現場時會遇到的實際案例，解釋所觀察到的化學反應現象。
The applications of vehicles include many chemical reactions, such as the use of paint spraying and coatings. To understand the operation principle and to develop special chemical function, it is necessary to have knowledge of general chemistry, organic chemistry, polymer chemistry and coatings. This course aims at teaching key chemical concepts, introduces chemical theories related to chemicals used in vehicles, further links to actual cases that students will encounter on the scene, and explains the chemical reaction phenomena observed.

Week 2		車用塗料與原理     
Week 3		抗腐蝕特性         
Week 4		化學與計量         
Week 5		原子、化學鍵       
Week 6		化學官能基         
Week 7		有機物分類         
Week 8		聚合物             
Week 9		期中考             
Week 10		高分子科學簡介     
Week 11		流變學與溶解度     
Week 12		測試鑑定           
Week 13		自然界的高分子     
Week 14		縮聚合反應         
Week 15		加成聚合反應       
Week 16		自由基鏈鎖聚合反應 
Week 17		未來展望
Week 18		期末考
